data.text: @ShtBlackwood It has been doing much more damage than flu to me sadly. The possible efdect of Pulmonary Fibrosis can be harmful to me for a life time. I do feel sorry for anyone catching it and hope you are feeling okay.

@zsl11913 Why are people under the impression they can go through life avoiding covid, just not possible.  I have been trying to get it for the last two years and finally managed last week. Like any flu it's not pleasant but we cannot avoid it! 
That's how the immune system functions.

@zsl11913 Same here. Been on planes, weddings and so many other stuff … never had it, went to a friends for lunch .. and we caught it… woke up today feeling rough, and burning with fever. Get well soon 💙
@PurpleDon1973 Yes! Waiting for the call back from 111 but struggling to speak. Will do 🔆 thank u
@zsl11913 I'm sorry to hear that.  Stay well.  Rest up - that's the crucial thing.  Hopefully you'll be on the mend very soon.  All the best
